p: Recently, Tapanelli et al. ( 2017) showed that Cu(I), Au(I), and Ag(I) phosphene complexes exhibited notable activity against the Plasmodium early sporogonic stages. The results showed that the metal complexes of general formula [M(L) 4]PF 6 (M = Cu(I), Ag(I) and [Au(L) 4]Cl with L = Thp (tris(hydroxymethyl) phosphene) or PTA (1,3,5-triaza-7-phosphaadamantane) interfere with the early sporogonic stage of Plasmodium, inhibiting the parasite establishment in the vector mosquito.
